DragonBlock.CampaignStatus","name":"status","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"weiLimit","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"donatedWei","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"creationTime","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"revisionTime","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint16","name":"weekDuration","type":"uint16"}],"internalType":"struct DragonBlock.Campaign[]","name":"","type":"tuple[]"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_owner","type":"address"}],"name":"getOwnedCampaigns","outputs":[{"components":[{"internalType":"address","name":"owner","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"id","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"enum DragonBlock.CampaignStatus","name":"status","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"weiLimit","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"donatedWei","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"creationTime","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"revisionTime","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint16","name":"weekDuration","type":"uint16"}],"internalType":"struct DragonBlock.Campaign[]","name":"","type":"tuple[]"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_user","type":"address"}],"name":"getUserCombatLvl","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"minter","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_id","type":"uint256"}],"name":"reportCampaign","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_id","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"_approval","type":"bool"}],"name":"revisionCampaign","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"ssjVaults","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"terminate","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_id","type":"uint256"}],"name":"terminateCampaign","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"verifiedUsers","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"verifyUser","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_id","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"_approval","type":"bool"}],"name":"voteForCampaign","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"A decentralized crowdfunding platform where users can create campaigns, donate, and vote using SuperSaiyan (SSJ) tokens.","kind":"dev","methods":{"_callback(address)":{"details":"Callback function triggered by the Oracle contract upon user verification.","params":{"_verifiedUser":"The address of the verified user."}},"becomeNormalUser()":{"details":"Allows users to transition from the SuperSaiyan Set to become a normal user by withdrawing their deposited ETH.The function checks whether the caller is part of the SuperSaiyan Set, and if so, transfers the deposited ETH back to the caller and sets their SSJ vault balance to zero."},"becomeSSJ()":{"details":"Allows users to become part of the SuperSaiyan Set by depositing ETH and meeting certain requirements.The function checks various conditions, such as current SSJ membership, DST balance, and the required deposit, before adding the caller to the SuperSaiyan Set.Upon successful execution, the function sets the caller's SSJ vault balance to the deposited ETH amount."},"constructor":{"details":"Constructor to initialize the contract","params":{"_oracleAddress":"Address of the DragonBlockOracle contract"}},"createCampaign(uint256,uint16)":{"details":"Creates a new campaign with specified donation limit and duration.The function performs various validations to ensure the correctness of input parameters and the user's combat level.If all validations pass, a new campaign is created with the specified details, and the campaign ID is emitted through an event.","params":{"_weekDuration":"The duration of the campaign in weeks.","_weiLimit":"The donation limit for the campaign, expressed in ETH."}},"donateCampaign(uint256)":{"details":"Allows a user to donate to an active campaign.The function checks various conditions, such as campaign existence, active status, donation window, and donation amount validity.If all conditions are met, the function updates the campaign's donation details and the user's DST balance accordingly.The function also records the donation details, including the donator's address and the donated amount.The donation must be in increments of 0.0005 ETH.The donated amount is converted to DST based on the conversion rate of 0.0005 ETH to 1 DST.","params":{"_id":"The unique identifier of the campaign to which the user wants to donate."}},"finalizeCampaign(uint256)":{"details":"Allows the owner of a pending campaign to finalize and determine its status.The function checks various conditions, such as campaign status, elapsed time, and ownership, before finalizing the campaign.If the campaign has more approvals than disapprovals, it is marked as \"ACTIVE.\" Otherwise, it is marked as \"DISAPPROVED.\"","params":{"_id":"The unique identifier of the campaign to be finalized."}},"finalizeRevisionCampaign(uint256)":{"details":"Allows the owner of a campaign in \"REVISION\" state to finalize it, updating its status.The function checks various conditions, such as campaign status, elapsed time, and ownership, before finalizing the campaign.If more approvals than disapprovals are received, the campaign status is updated to \"ACTIVE.\"If disapprovals surpass approvals, the campaign is marked as \"BANNED,\" and associated actions (slashing SSJ users, rewarding reporters, rewarding SSJ users, refunding donators) are performed.Approval and disapproval lists for revisioned campaigns are cleared to maintain data integrity.","params":{"_id":"The unique identifier of the campaign to be finalized."}},"getCampaigns(uint256)":{"details":"Retrieves a window of campaigns based on the specified window size.The function performs validations to ensure a valid window size and calculates the starting index for the window.It then creates a memory array to store the window of campaigns and copies the elements to the result array.The result array contains a maximum of 20 campaigns, or fewer if there are fewer campaigns than the window size.","params":{"_campaignWindow":"The size of the campaign window to retrieve."},"returns":{"_0":"An array of Campaign structs representing the campaigns within the specified window."}},"getOwnedCampaigns(address)":{"details":"Retrieves an array of campaigns owned by the specified address.The function counts the number of campaigns owned by the specified address, creates an array to hold the owned campaigns, and populates the array with the owned campaigns.The result array contains all campaigns owned by the specified address, or an empty array if there are no owned campaigns.","params":{"_owner":"The address of the owner for whom to retrieve owned campaigns."},"returns":{"_0":"An array of Campaign structs representing the campaigns owned by the specified address."}},"getUserCombatLvl(address)":{"details":"Retrieves the combat level of a user based on their DST balance.Calculates the combat level by multiplying the user's DST balance by 10.If the resulting combat level is greater than or equal to 9000, the function returns 9000.Otherwise, it returns the calculated combat level based on the user's DST balance.","params":{"_user":"The address of the user for whom the combat level is to be calculated."},"returns":{"_0":"uint256 representing the combat level of the user."}},"reportCampaign(uint256)":{"details":"Allows a user to report an active campaign.The function checks various conditions, such as campaign existence, active status, and the user's DST balance.If all conditions are met, the function deducts 1 DST from the user, records the report, and checks if the campaign needs to enter the revision state.If more than one report is received, the campaign is marked as \"REVISION\" with the timestamp of the revision state.","params":{"_id":"The unique identifier of the campaign to be reported."}},"revisionCampaign(uint256,bool)":{"details":"Allows SuperSaiyan Set members to vote (approve or disapprove) for the revision of a campaign.The function checks various conditions, such as SSJ membership, campaign status, elapsed time, previous votes, and voting history, before recording the vote.The function updates the approval or disapproval lists for the revision of the specified campaign based on the voter's choice.","params":{"_approval":"A boolean indicating whether the voter approves (true) or disapproves (false) of the revision.","_id":"The unique identifier of the campaign to vote for revision."}},"terminate()":{"details":"Public function for the contract creator to terminate the contract and withdraw funds"},"terminateCampaign(uint256)":{"details":"Allows the owner of an active campaign to terminate it, marking it as \"ENDED.\"The function checks various conditions, such as campaign status, elapsed time, and ownership, before terminating the campaign.Upon termination, the campaign is marked as \"ENDED,\" SSJ users are rewarded, and the remaining funds are transferred to the campaign owner.Additionally, approval and disapproval lists for revisioned campaigns are cleared to maintain data integrity.","params":{"_id":"The unique identifier of the campaign to be terminated."}},"verifyUser()":{"details":"Verifies a user by interacting with the DragonBlock Oracle.Checks if the caller's address is not already verified and initiates the verification process through the DragonBlock Oracle.If the caller's address is not verified, the function calls the `verifyUser` function on the DragonBlock Oracle contract."},"voteForCampaign(uint256,bool)":{"details":"Allows SuperSaiyan Set members to vote (approve or disapprove) for a pending campaign.The function checks various conditions, such as SSJ membership, campaign status, elapsed time, and previous votes, before recording the vote.The function updates the approval or disapproval lists for the specified campaign based on the voter's choice.","params":{"_approval":"A boolean indicating whether the voter approves (true) or disapproves (false) of the campaign.","_id":"The unique identifier of the campaign to vote for."},"returns":{"_0":"The remaining SSJ (SuperSaiyan) vault balance of the voter after the vote."}}},"title":"DragonBlock Smart Contract","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/DragonBlock.sol":"DragonBlock"},"evmVersion":"london","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"project:/contracts/DragonBlock.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc1bb581b3c21fb653796f971eae89a4c21d06cf190939736a3fb6a988840b4a5","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://da5166da6e0985a8a9234cdf9b6a5a4aa2fcdd239d9bd56299d6963e117ea222","dweb:/ipfs/QmeKGht4CVtbFemt82up2yyvMRCAmyvuDJLVwK7zVQmEP3"]},"project:/contracts/DragonBlockOracle.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8a5139805a89ec9c19694859d12897a4641133542fc194f7cc7a81a63c94b38e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1261d78b0440370989880536abd14ee973e1879a32923fb286b34f64bae50e57","dweb:/ipfs/QmZ9RdUqCeMaSneATpSJ6NfTSam6eN29htEmqFrvTPLcjF"]},"project:/contracts/UsingOracle.sol":{"keccak256":"0x71dfdfb48b1474aec9e937c1fb61768524a11513432d4e8d039ac5cf9de8081f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1b03a7e425e01546e211b7965395bac892eaa093e94d4502d2fba4117fb37eea","dweb:/ipfs/QmbrVNiqHt9iX4UTQARf7m2nUSU5o5FEtNDabFf6jNoAdx"]}},"version":1}

documentation.text:
@dev Allows users to transition from the SuperSaiyan Set to become a normal user by withdrawing their deposited ETH.
 @dev The function checks whether the caller is part of the SuperSaiyan Set, and if so, transfers the deposited ETH back to the caller and sets their SSJ vault balance to zero.
@dev Public function for the contract creator to terminate the contract and withdraw funds

devdoc.details: A decentralized crowdfunding platform where users can create campaigns, donate, and vote using SuperSaiyan (SSJ) tokens.

_callback(address).details: Callback function triggered by the Oracle contract upon user verification.

params._verifiedUser: The address of the verified user.

becomeNormalUser().details: Allows users to transition from the SuperSaiyan Set to become a normal user by withdrawing their deposited ETH.The function checks whether the caller is part of the SuperSaiyan Set, and if so, transfers the deposited ETH back to the caller and sets their SSJ vault balance to zero.

becomeSSJ().details: Allows users to become part of the SuperSaiyan Set by depositing ETH and meeting certain requirements.The function checks various conditions, such as current SSJ membership, DST balance, and the required deposit, before adding the caller to the SuperSaiyan Set.Upon successful execution, the function sets the caller's SSJ vault balance to the deposited ETH amount.

createCampaign(uint256,uint16).details: Creates a new campaign with specified donation limit and duration.The function performs various validations to ensure the correctness of input parameters and the user's combat level.If all validations pass, a new campaign is created with the specified details, and the campaign ID is emitted through an event.

params._weekDuration: The duration of the campaign in weeks.
params._weiLimit: The donation limit for the campaign, expressed in ETH.

donateCampaign(uint256).details: Allows a user to donate to an active campaign.The function checks various conditions, such as campaign existence, active status, donation window, and donation amount validity.If all conditions are met, the function updates the campaign's donation details and the user's DST balance accordingly.The function also records the donation details, including the donator's address and the donated amount.The donation must be in increments of 0.0005 ETH.The donated amount is converted to DST based on the conversion rate of 0.0005 ETH to 1 DST.

params._id: The unique identifier of the campaign to which the user wants to donate.

finalizeCampaign(uint256).details: Allows the owner of a pending campaign to finalize and determine its status.The function checks various conditions, such as campaign status, elapsed time, and ownership, before finalizing the campaign.If the campaign has more approvals than disapprovals, it is marked as "ACTIVE." Otherwise, it is marked as "DISAPPROVED."

params._id: The unique identifier of the campaign to be finalized.

finalizeRevisionCampaign(uint256).details: Allows the owner of a campaign in "REVISION" state to finalize it, updating its status.The function checks various conditions, such as campaign status, elapsed time, and ownership, before finalizing the campaign.If more approvals than disapprovals are received, the campaign status is updated to "ACTIVE."If disapprovals surpass approvals, the campaign is marked as "BANNED," and associated actions (slashing SSJ users, rewarding reporters, rewarding SSJ users, refunding donators) are performed.Approval and disapproval lists for revisioned campaigns are cleared to maintain data integrity.

params._id: The unique identifier of the campaign to be finalized.

getCampaigns(uint256).details: Retrieves a window of campaigns based on the specified window size.The function performs validations to ensure a valid window size and calculates the starting index for the window.It then creates a memory array to store the window of campaigns and copies the elements to the result array.The result array contains a maximum of 20 campaigns, or fewer if there are fewer campaigns than the window size.

params._campaignWindow: The size of the campaign window to retrieve.

returns._0: An array of Campaign structs representing the campaigns within the specified window.

getOwnedCampaigns(address).details: Retrieves an array of campaigns owned by the specified address.The function counts the number of campaigns owned by the specified address, creates an array to hold the owned campaigns, and populates the array with the owned campaigns.The result array contains all campaigns owned by the specified address, or an empty array if there are no owned campaigns.

params._owner: The address of the owner for whom to retrieve owned campaigns.

returns._0: An array of Campaign structs representing the campaigns owned by the specified address.

getUserCombatLvl(address).details: Retrieves the combat level of a user based on their DST balance.Calculates the combat level by multiplying the user's DST balance by 10.If the resulting combat level is greater than or equal to 9000, the function returns 9000.Otherwise, it returns the calculated combat level based on the user's DST balance.

params._user: The address of the user for whom the combat level is to be calculated.

returns._0: uint256 representing the combat level of the user.

reportCampaign(uint256).details: Allows a user to report an active campaign.The function checks various conditions, such as campaign existence, active status, and the user's DST balance.If all conditions are met, the function deducts 1 DST from the user, records the report, and checks if the campaign needs to enter the revision state.If more than one report is received, the campaign is marked as "REVISION" with the timestamp of the revision state.

params._id: The unique identifier of the campaign to be reported.

revisionCampaign(uint256,bool).details: Allows SuperSaiyan Set members to vote (approve or disapprove) for the revision of a campaign.The function checks various conditions, such as SSJ membership, campaign status, elapsed time, previous votes, and voting history, before recording the vote.The function updates the approval or disapproval lists for the revision of the specified campaign based on the voter's choice.

params._approval: A boolean indicating whether the voter approves (true) or disapproves (false) of the revision.
params._id: The unique identifier of the campaign to vote for revision.

terminate().details: Public function for the contract creator to terminate the contract and withdraw funds

terminateCampaign(uint256).details: Allows the owner of an active campaign to terminate it, marking it as "ENDED."The function checks various conditions, such as campaign status, elapsed time, and ownership, before terminating the campaign.Upon termination, the campaign is marked as "ENDED," SSJ users are rewarded, and the remaining funds are transferred to the campaign owner.Additionally, approval and disapproval lists for revisioned campaigns are cleared to maintain data integrity.

params._id: The unique identifier of the campaign to be terminated.

verifyUser().details: Verifies a user by interacting with the DragonBlock Oracle.Checks if the caller's address is not already verified and initiates the verification process through the DragonBlock Oracle.If the caller's address is not verified, the function calls the `verifyUser` function on the DragonBlock Oracle contract.

voteForCampaign(uint256,bool).details: Allows SuperSaiyan Set members to vote (approve or disapprove) for a pending campaign.The function checks various conditions, such as SSJ membership, campaign status, elapsed time, and previous votes, before recording the vote.The function updates the approval or disapproval lists for the specified campaign based on the voter's choice.

params._approval: A boolean indicating whether the voter approves (true) or disapproves (false) of the campaign.
params._id: The unique identifier of the campaign to vote for.

returns._0: The remaining SSJ (SuperSaiyan) vault balance of the voter after the vote.

devdoc.title: DragonBlock Smart Contract
